snippet: The ideal solution would be for all countries to agree to end the advantages.
abstract: Editorial supports plan by Treasury Department to explore ways it can use its administrative powers to stem rising tide of corporate tax avoidance; holds that corporate tax gaming, particularly use of inversions, has become excessive to point of abuse; faults Congress for inaction, particularly Republicans whose main goal is reduction of corporate tax rates.
lead_paragraph: The ideal solution would be for all countries to agree to end the advantages.
